body.name: Dyonery Queen Mattress 10 Inch Green Tea Memory Foam Queen Mattress in a Box, CertiPUR-US Certified Fiberglass Free Mattress, Cooling Gel Double Mattress Medium Firm 60"x80"

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 【Cooling Gel-Infused Green Tea Memory Foam Mattress】The Dyonery queen mattress offers pressure-relieving, temperature-regulated sleep. The all foam system includes ultra-cooling gel and green tea infused memory foam and durable, high density base support foam. The green tea infusion helps to keep the queen green tea memory foam mattress fresh and clean, while the cooling gel helps to regulate temperature and prevent overheating.

【Graphene Jacquard Knitted Removable Cover & Fiberglass-Free Inner Cover】The soft and breathable cover regulates temperature and absorbs pressure, while the fiberglass-free inner cover provides a safe and effective flame retardant layer. Together, these covers help to ensure your new queen mattress gives you a restful night's sleep.

【CertiPUR-US & Oeko-Tex Standard 100 Certified】Our queen mattresses are certified by both CertiPUR-US and Oeko-Tex Standard 100, ensuring that they are free from harmful substances. The memory foam and fabrics have been independently evaluated to comply with all mandatory and voluntary safety standards for mattress products. These certifications provide peace of mind to consumers who are looking for a safe and healthy mattress.

【Queen Mattress in a Box】Our 10 inch memory foam queen mattresses are shipped in a compressed, rolled form in a compact box for easy delivery and setup. They can be used with any type of frame, including box springs, floors, adjustable beds, foundations, slatted platforms, flat platforms, and hospital beds. Simply allow 2 hours for the mattress to fully expand to its original shape.

【10-Year Limited Warranty for Worry-Free Sleep】We are dedicated to providing you with the best night's sleep possible through our superior products. If there are any issues with your green tea mattress, please contact our customer support team and they will assist you in resolving the problem. Please note that our mattresses cannot be returned once opened.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product and Timely Delivery
reviews.reviewText: I waited until the product had been used before rating and have been 100% satisfied. Product inflated perfectly with minimal odor from the start. No residual smell after about 12 hours. With guest visiting throughout the holidays, all reported complete satisfaction with firmness, comfort and fit and form while sleeping. Delivery was on time, communications were also flawless. Highly recommend the product with this merchant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more hip or back pain!
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t think I would like memory foam, however, this mattress changed my mind. I have a history of back surgery and usually have pillows strategically placed but after having this mattress, I really don’t need to do that anymore. The mattress does everything for me and I can sneak out of bed without waking up the cat or dog because nothing moves! It’s just soft and melts into the perfect shape. No bouncing! Love it! Plus it was very well priced and easy to unbox! Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have 3 different brands of Amazon "bed in a box" mattresses. They are all the same memory foam styles. I have also owned many types of mattresses from a sleep number to tempurpedic and everything in between to alleviate back pain from military service.This is by far the best mattress I've ever purchased.It was purchased as a cheap option to needing a guest bed but turned out to be my bed of choice. My only regret is that I didn't get a king size to use in my room.You are able to sleep on your side, back or stomach comfortably. Normally, I toss and turn all night but I don't with this one.If you happen to turn them there is a less than ideal depression. It takes less than a minute to resolve but it is more noticable than my other two mattresses or a traditional inner spring mattress.There was no smell from the mattress as there had been with my other one and it inflated rather quickly.The mattress is soft yet progressively firm to support you.Movement from others is hardly noticeable.It's true to size and fairly lightweight.It appears to have a washable outer cover.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great product low price.
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had this bed for a few days now and it’s actually very comfortable. I didn’t have much expectation for the price. I will say compared to the $3000 I paid for a bed just last year this one seems to be better quality. It reduced my back pain and it was an easy set up. I will follow up after time but so far it was well worth the purchase. If you need something fast do not hesitate, just get it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this randomly after being fed up with my old spring mattress. I was anxious, but i LOVE this bed. We’ve slept on it for a month now and have 0 regrets. At first, it felt extremely firm, but after allowing it to decompress fully (1 full night) I found it to be quite comfortable. It’s firm, but you sink into it just a tad. Perfect balance between soft and supportive. You can’t beat the price and value!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought the 10in twin. It fits on her bunkbead perfectly and it's very comfy! Worth every penny. Open with caution as to not cut into the matress. Be patient! I followed the instructions to open on porch or garage and let air out for an hour(I layed it out on a king comforter so it wouldn't get dirty. Takes two people to get in so you dont drag it or bump it) which I'm glad I did. Brought in and hour and a half later. No smell. Took about 4 days to reach full size. Maybe longer. I wouldn't recommend sleeping on it until fully expanded!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Uncomfortably firm. I had not realized HOW firm this would be. I am now buying a mattress topper to go over it. Product came quickly and was quick to expand once out of the vacuum sealed packaging it was in. There was no smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a great mattress!
reviews.reviewText: I live in one state, but have a small apartment in another. I had to purchase a mattress for the place and could not see spending $900 on one that I would only use maybe a couple nights a month. I bought this. Well, I’m over the moon with how comfortable it is! I’m going to see if they have a king size for our bed at home! They probably don’t last as long as a ‘real mattress’ but - define ‘real’. Great support, but not hard. Lightweight enough that I don’t feel like I’m wrestling to put a fitted sheet on. Soft enough through the support to take it easy on my joints. I love it. Absolutely love it!
